name: WooCommerce Add To Cart Redirection
author: Harun R Rayhan

sections.description:
You are looking for redirection to any page including cart or checkout? ** WooCommerce Add To Cart Redirection ** will save you! It will redirect upon product added to cart. You can choose any page to redirect.

Key Features

  • Easy installation & configuration
  • Redirect to any selected page
  • Support for AJAX Cart button
sections.installation:
Easy Way: Install From WordPress Dashboard (Recommended)

  1. Got to Plugins -> Add New (Login to WP-Admin panel as admin)
  2. Paste WooCommerce Add To Cart Redirection on search box
  3. Click install and activate the plugin

Manual Installation: Using WordPress Dashboard

If you want to install manually from WP Dashboard, follow these steps:

  1. Download the plugin by clicking on the red button above. A ZIP file will be downloaded.
  2. Login to your site’s admin panel and navigate to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload.
  3. Click choose file, select the plugin file and click install

Manual Installation: Using FTP

If you want to install using FTP for some reason, follow these steps:

  1. Download the plugin by clicking on the red button above. A ZIP file will be downloaded.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Launch your favorite FTP client. Such as FileZilla, FireFTP, CyberDuck etc. If you are a more advanced user, then you can use SSH too.
  4. Upload the folder to wp-content/plugins/
  5. Log in to your WordPress dashboard.
  6. Navigate to Plugins -> Installed
  7. Activate the plugin
sections.faq:
How can configure this plugin?

Navigate to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Products. Select the page you want redirect from Redirection Link drop-down. Check screenshots for more details.

How to enable redirection?

Check above FAQ

Is it working with AJAX Add to cart button?

Yes, it is.
